metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17543 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: LZ4 before 1.9.2 has a heap-based buffer overflow in LZ4_write32 (relatedto LZ4_compress_destSize), affecting applications that callLZ4_compress_fast with a large input. (This issue can also lead to datacorruption.) NOTE: the vendor states "only a few specific / uncommon usagesof the API are at risk."

criterions.comment: lz4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
